Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • Link

  • public class Link
extends info.gridworld.actor.Actor
    The main actor class that serves as the user controlled character

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Overrides the act method so Link does nothing when step is pressed. Checks things associated with attacking and being attacked.
        Overrides:
        act in class info.gridworld.actor.Actor

      • getImageSuffix

        public java.lang.String getImageSuffix()
        Method to determine which image to display. Returms "_sword" if attacking Default image is Link.gif
        Returns:
        the suffix to append to "Link" to retrieve the appropriate .gif file
